attributes.action: New Pensions policy to include those who have already been forced to buy annuities
attributes.additional_details:
To Extend the new Private Pensions Policy to include those already force to by annuities.

We all know why he’s done it, the release of these pension funds will not only give the chancellor a huge tax boost but will also inject billions into the economy.

How much more cash could be liquidated were he to allow current annuity owners to sell them back to the providers!
